snippet: Mr. Carey was the founder of W. P. Carey & Company, an investment management firm that innovatively used the sale-leaseback model.
abstract: William P Carey, leader in commercial real estate, dies at age 81.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Carey was the founder of W. P. Carey & Company, an investment management firm that innovatively used the sale-leaseback model.

headline.seo: William P. Carey, Leader in Commercial Real Estate, Dies at 81
headline.main: William P. Carey, Leader in Commercial Real Estate, Dies at 81
headline.print_headline: William P. Carey, 81, Leader In Commercial Real Estate
